metadata.title: DPM congratulates nation on PakistanÃ¢ÂÂs successful bid for non-permanent membership of UNSC

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 04 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Ishaq Dar congratulated the entire nation on Pakistanas successful bid for non-permanent membership of the UN Security Council for years 2025 and 2026. In a post on X, he said, aA very proud achievement for the Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif and his government to secure this 8th term at the UNSC. During the term Pakistan will continue to uphold the UN Charter and international law.a aWell done Pakistan Team at Foreign Office and Permanent Mission in New York for spearheading this achievement,a he added.
content.summary: Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Ishaq Dar congratulated Pakistan on its successful bid for non-permanent membership of the UN Security Council for 2025 and 2026. He acknowledged the achievement of Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif's government and the efforts of the Pakistan Team at the Foreign Office and Permanent Mission in New York.
